a ~ of oppression
迫害下的牺牲者
~s of war
战争的牺牲者

become [be made] a [the] ~ of

We carried the ~s of the accident to the hospital.

a ~ of a swindler

(为祭神而杀的人或动物)
fall (a) victim to?

They fell ~ to their own greed.
